200;Bro Patrick Chivaura;;"The Lord saw it befitting to call Bro Patrick Chivaura to his reward. He will be buried Tuesday afternoon at 14:00 at Glenforest. Mourners are gathered at Plot 12 Goodhope Road Mt Hampden. There shall be evening services.

To those driving at 3km From Westgate roundabout along Chinhoyi Road turn right into Goodhope Road and travel about +2km you will see a white tent near the Road. You can get lifts to Goodhope at Parklane and Leopold Takawira n drop off at Plot 12."
